member.name: T:Random.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Random.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Random.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

members.member: A random number generator with a uniform distribution using the Mersenne Twister algorithm.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator with a particular seed.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.#ctor(System.UInt32[])
member.summary: Create a new Mersenne Twister random number generator with a particular initial key.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.NextUInt32
member.summary: Generates a random number between 0 and System.UInt32.MaxValue.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.Next
member.summary: Generates a random integer between 0 and System.Int32.MaxValue.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random integer between 0 and maxValue.
member.param: The maximum value. Must be greater than zero.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a random integer between minValue and maxValue.

member.name: M:Random.MersenneTwister.NextDouble
member.summary: Generates a random floating point number between 0 and 1.
